title: Dublin: Man charged over fatal shooting
article: A man has been charged in relation to a fatal shooting in west Dublin on 9 January. Michael Tormey, who was in his 40s, was found dead outside his home in Thomond Road in Ballyfermot just before 05:00 local time. On Tuesday, Gardaí (Irish police) said a 40-year-old man had been charged and is due to appear in court on Wednesday. A woman, 39, who had also been questioned was released without charge and a file will be sent to prosecutors,
